title: A Flavour of German - Lesson 08
description: Spice up your language with A Flavour of German. Learn to use real German and increase your range of expression. In episode 08 you will learn to talk about dating using more interesting German. Access our lesson guide and enhanced podcasts from our website on http://www.languageflavours.com
content:encoded: Spice up your language with A Flavour of German. Learn to use real German and increase your range of expression. In episode 08 you will learn to talk about dating using more interesting German. Access our lesson guide and enhanced podcasts from our website on http://www.languageflavours.com
itunes:subtitle: Use idiomatic German to talk about dating.
